dcterms:creator: E.-M. Rathner
Y. Terhorst
N. Cummins
B. Schuller
H. Baumeister
dcterms:description: A corpus of spoken personal narratives (PNs) manually annotated with emotion carriers, collected from 100 participants who recollected two positive and two negative PNs. The PNs are transcribed manually and annotated with text spans that explain the emotional state of the narrator.
dcterms:title: Ulm State-of-Mind in Speech (USoMs) corpus

dcterms:creator: B. W. Schuller
S. Steidl
A. Batliner
P. B. Marschik
H. Baumeister
F. Dong
S. Hantke
F. B. Pokorny
E.-M. Rathner
K. D. Bartl-Pokorny
dcterms:description: A sub-challenge of the Interspeech 2018 Computational Paralinguistics Challenge focusing on atypical and self-assessed affect, crying, and heartbeats.
dcterms:title: Self-Assessed Affect Sub-challenge
